instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'WIRELESS & NETWORKS,' tap Bluetooth . Tap the Bluetooth switch to turn on. The phone scans for available devices. From the Available device list, tap a device to pair. When prompted, enter the PIN and tap OK . On the other device, accept the pairing.
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'WIRELESS & NETWORKS,' tap Bluetooth . Tap the Bluetooth switch to turn on or off.
